Summary: Starlike object changes direction in no particular pattern still out there right now
divs: Sighting Detailsthought I was looking at a bright star till it started moving then it started making abrupt changes in movement. It then went back in to a statuary position. It does this intermittently. It's still out there mimic a star with slight changes every five to ten minutes. With frequent movement that go from fast and jerky to slow but noticeable. Took some video but it was hard to stay still and gave up.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cabot
There were no other sightings in Cabot on or around November 1st 2011
